read signature: 
0xA1 = 0b10100001
Daten:
0x01 = 0b00000001
0x57 = 0b01011000
0x61 = 0b01110001
0x01 = 0b00000001
0xFF = 0b11111111

write PLL MN:
0xE2 = 0b01110010
Daten
0x1D = 0b00011101
0x02 = 0b00000010
0x04 = 0b00000100

read PLL MN:
0xE3 = 0b01110011
Daten:
0x2D = 0b00101101 
0x23 = 0b00100011
0x00 = 0b00000000

erwartet:
0x2D = 0b00101101
0x03 = 0b00000011
0x00 = 0b00000000
